about_the_game:
In collaboration with the publishing house BILDNER Verlag, we present "The Official Guides" for Railway Empire 2.

The Mission Guide explains how to best complete the campaign and the scenarios in which you re-enact important events in railway history. You will find tips and tricks for all campaign chapters and scenarios with the tasks to be completed and information on the historical background. The book also contains explanations of all game modes and an overview of the cities with their available goods on the game maps.



You can find your Railway Empire 2 guide in your Steam Apps game folder: \steamapps\common\Railway Empire 2\guidebook

Or access this folder from the properties of the game in your library, choose "local files", then "browse".
